title: Digitalising governance processes and water resources management to foster sustainability strategies in the Mediterranean agriculture
content:
Publication date: August 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 158

Author(s): Jesús E. Argente García, Burcu Yazici, Amina Richa, Sami Touil, Vicente José Richart Díaz, Alfonso P. Ramallo-González, Antonio F. Skarmeta Gómez
